features.name: Renders Active Page
features.description: Displays the active page based on the `page` index.

features.name: Render Modes
features.description: Supports two modes: (1) Render only the active page or (2) Render all pages but hide inactive ones using `display: none`.

features.name: Custom Styles
features.description: Supports a `style` prop to apply custom inline styles to the container.

props.name: children
props.description: An array of React elements, each representing a page to display.

props.name: page
props.description: The index of the currently active page to be displayed.

props.name: rendered
props.description: Determines whether only the active page is rendered (`true`) or all pages are rendered with inactive ones hidden (`false`).

props.name: style
props.description: An optional CSS style object to apply custom styles to the container.
